kdubl_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<Invoice xmlns:cac="urn:oasis:names:specification:ubl:schema:xsd:CommonAggregateComponents-2" xmlns:cbc="urn:oasis:names:specification:ubl:schema:xsd:CommonBasicComponents-2">
  <cbc:UBLVersionID>2.1</cbc:UBLVersionID>
  <cbc:CustomizationID>开票任务单2</cbc:CustomizationID>
  <cbc:ID>23902445</cbc:ID>
  <cbc:IssueDate>2025-01-08</cbc:IssueDate>
  <cbc:InvoiceTypeCode>380</cbc:InvoiceTypeCode>
  <cbc:DocumentCurrencyCode>CNY</cbc:DocumentCurrencyCode>
  <cac:AccountingSupplierParty>
    <cac:Party>
      <cbc:Name>携程广州</cbc:Name>
    </cac:Party>
  </cac:AccountingSupplierParty>
  <cac:AccountingCustomerParty>
    <cac:Party>
      <cbc:Name>金蝶广州</cbc:Name>
    </cac:Party>
  </cac:AccountingCustomerParty>
  <cac:OrderReference>
    <cbc:ID>23902445</cbc:ID>
  </cac:OrderReference>
  <cac:InvoiceLine>
    <cbc:ID>1</cbc:ID>
    <cbc:InvoicedQuantity unitCode="EA">1</cbc:InvoicedQuantity>
    <cbc:LineExtensionAmount currencyID="CNY">8000</cbc:LineExtensionAmount>
    <cac:Item>
      <cbc:Name>住房</cbc:Name>
    </cac:Item>
    <cac:Price>
      <cbc:PriceAmount currencyID="CNY">8000</cbc:PriceAmount>
    </cac:Price>
    <cbc:Note>发生时间: 2025-01-09</cbc:Note>
  </cac:InvoiceLine>
  <cac:LegalMonetaryTotal>
    <cbc:LineExtensionAmount currencyID="CNY">8000</cbc:LineExtensionAmount>
    <cbc:PayableAmount currencyID="CNY">8000</cbc:PayableAmount>
  </cac:LegalMonetaryTotal>
</Invoice>
